title: The Living Planet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/3/22
itunes:title: The Living Planet - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/3/22
description:
George Noory and cosmologist Jude Currivan discuss her theory that Earth and the entire universe are living sentient beings, if the universe itself is continuing to evolve and change, and how humans are connected to our living planet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
